data.eml:eml: Fifteen new species of Chilicola (Oroediscelis) (Hymenoptera: Colletidae: Xeromelissinae) with illustrated keys to the males and females of the subgenus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Packer, Laurence, Dumesh, Sheila (2019): Fifteen new species of Chilicola (Oroediscelis) (Hymenoptera: Colletidae: Xeromelissinae) with illustrated keys to the males and females of the subgenus. Zootaxa 4559 (1): 1-56, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4559.1.1
